ComicInfo.Title: Special Dispensation; First Impression; Bondage Palace, Part 5
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 15:36:57. [CVDB468381] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:57:55. [Issue ID 761889]
ComicInfo.Writer: Carlos Trillo,Eduardo Maicas,Franco Saudelli,Stefano Gaudiano,Carlos Trillo,Eduardo Maicas,Franco Saudelli,Stefano Gaudiano
ComicInfo.Summary:
Special Dispensation: Betty's confession may be too hot for the local priest to handle.
First Impression: Betty gets a first-timer.
Bondage Palace, Part 5: The Popess Crimilde's plans are undone by the riot at the weight reduction resort. And Ethel Lorimar goes into the final stages of her manifestation, revealing both the formula and its deadly side-effects.
